\dHmm...\d%K%P
Ever since we had left the main shrine something\nhad been off about Yukari.%K%P
She seemed really taken aback by how much of a\nhead start Kaede had over her in getting to know\nme.%K%P
\dYukari? You're not making much progress.\d%K%P
\dI know I know. I'm not trying to be slack or\nanything.\d%K%P
Aside from cleaning, some of the other work we did\nat the shrine included managing our stock of charms\nand fortunes.%K%P
\dSorry for dragging you all into this.\d%K%P
\dOh no, any good wife would help her husband.\d%K%P
\dWell I'm no wife, and I'm sick of this.\d%K%P
\dI mean, I'm just here for carnal pleasures, right?\nIsn't that enough?\d%K%P
\dWe'll have none of that! Even I don't get to\nsatisfy those pleasures.\d%K%P
\dKaede's the lucky one. She actually got to play\naround with him.\d%K%P
\dWha-- 'Play around'? Well I never...\d%K%P
Kaede sent a troubled gaze my way.%K%P
\dAha... Ahaha...\d%K%P
\dWhat are you trying to pull? Playing coy and\nall...\d%K%P
\dI've never even gotten the chance to lock lips.\nYet you...you...\d%K%P
\dYou act like you know everything there is to know\nabout Akira...\d%K%P
\dI'll never forgive you for this...\d%K%P
And just like that, Yukari's Jinriki clouded around\nher.%K%P
\dWhoa! Uh, Yukari? Let's settle down here!\d%K%P
Shion had a scowl on her face.%K%P
The very air around us felt heavy.%K%P
\d'Settle down,' you say? What do you mean?\d%K%P
\dI'm the one who is settled down. Oh yes, quite\nsettled indeed.\d%K%P
\dHehe, Eheheheh...!\d%K%P
Her Jinriki grew and grew into Tatari.%K%P
Since it had no clear target I couldn't hold it all\nback.%K%P
\dWho even cares anymore? If I can't get what I\nwant, then down with it all!\d%K%P
\dYukari!\d%K%P
\dThat's enough! You rowdy little Tatarigami!\d%K%P
Kaede went in and slapped Yukari hard on the\ncheek.%K%P
\dWh-What are you...\d%K%P
\dAre you really going to throw this all away? What\ndoes that do for anyone?\d%K%P
\dI won't let you end up like I was!\d%K%P
Kaede was really letting Yukari have it. Kaede knew\nfirst-hand what it was like to be a Tatarigami.%K%P
They were rivals, but she was honestly worried for\nher, too.%K%P
Slapped out of her state, Yukari stared up at\nKaede.%K%P
The Tatari that had spread throughout the room was\nquelled in an instant.%K%P
\dAre you back with us now?\d%K%P
\dY-Yeah...\d%K%P
\dGood. Glad to hear it.\d%K%P
Kaede spoke with a smile nicer than any I'd ever\nseen.%K%P
Even Yukari, who had seen her as nothing but a\nrival, was captivated by it.%K%P
\dUgh, do I hear rain?\d%K%P
Raindrops outside made themselves heard.%K%P
Then the rain began to fall, like the fall of sweet\ntears.%K%P
\dThat's probably from the Tatari just now. I'd say\nwe should be glad that's all there is.\d%K%P
\dAt least she didn't cause a volcano to erupt, like\nI did.\d%K%P
\dShion, you look after her. I'm going to bring the\nlaundry inside.\d%K%P
Leaving the dazed Yukari in Shion's hands, Kaede\nheaded outside.%K%P
\dI'll help!\d%K%P
\dThank you. I was just about to ask.\d%K%P
The Tatari rain only lasted a few minutes.%K%P
Even so, it turned into quite the downpour. We were\nsoaked just from stepping out to get the laundry.%K%P
\dWell, at least we got everything.\d%K%P
\dWe're a little wet, but I guess this isn't so\nbad.\d%K%P
\dMight as well hang it all up inside.\d%K%P
Yukari seemed to be back to normal.%K%P
Something was still restless inside me, though.%K%P
\dWow, I am just soaked...\d%K%P
Turning to look at her, I saw Kaede's wet clothes\nclinging tightly to her body.%K%P
She had worked so hard to keep the laundry dry\nthat she took the full force of the rain herself.%K%P
It was...quite a sight.%K%P
\dUhm, Akira?\d%K%P
\dD-D-Don't worry, I didn't see anything.\d%K%P
\dOh, did you, uhh...?\d%K%P
\dYou noticed you can see through my clothes, huh?\d%K%P
\dWell, I mean... Just a little. You always look\ngreat, but uhh...this is...\d%K%P
\dBut it's not as if I'm standing here undressed or\nanything...\d%K%P
\dThat only makes it worse for us guys.\d%K%P
Don't make me spell it out...%K%P
Everyone knew that see-through clothes were way\nsexier than just seeing someone in the nude.%K%P
\dB-But...your chest?\d%K%P
I saw no sign of any underwear under her top.%K%P
Which meant she might be bra-less.%K%P
\dOh, yeah, I didn't wear a bra today...\d%K%P
\dYou should. What if they got all...droopy or\nsomething?\d%K%P
\dWell that wouldn't do, would it?\d%K%P
\dYou'd still love me if they were though, right?\d%K%P
\dHmm...\d%K%P
\dWell come on, look at me when you speak.\d%K%P
She pressed them out for me to see.%K%P
That figure of hers made the very idea seem\nridiculous. She was beautiful.%K%P
\dOf course I would...\d%K%P
\dLook at you, all shy. I see why Yukari thinks\nyou're so cute.\d%K%P
\dEnough. C'mon, you're gonna catch a cold...\d%K%P
\dWow, look at you two! You're drenched!\d%K%P
And just then Shion walked in on us.%K%P
\dOh my, this was all from my Tatari! Let me undress\nyou to apologize!\d%K%P
\dSlow down, I can handle this myself!\d%K%P
\dOnce you've undressed I want you to head right in\nfor a bath! Oh, how could I have forgotten to\nprepare a bath?\d%K%P
Yukari was back to her normal self like nothing had\neven happened.%K%P
\dI think we need to worry about Kaede first. Just\nlook at her, all wet and sexy...\d%K%P
\dThis...definitely will not do.\d%K%P
Yukari's eyes narrowed.%K%P
But she didn't seem ready to fire off more Tatari.%K%P
\dI thought I sensed some sexual tension in the air.\nI'll take that to mean you're into this sort of\nthing, Akira.\d%K%P
\dWha-- 'Sexual tension'? No...\d%K%P
\dNo?\d%K%P
\dIt's no use lying, Aki.\d%K%P
\dVery well! I'll go soak myself for you! Then you\ncan enjoy my wet body!\d%K%P
\dBut it's not even raining anymore!\d%K%P
\dI can change that, just you wait!\d%K%P
Yukari ran outside in determination.%K%P
\dShe's got spirit, that one.\d%K%P
\dGlad to see her back to normal, though. I wouldn't\nhave been surprised if she'd been out of it for a\nwhile.\d%K%P
\dLooks like you've got some 'spirit' in your pocket\nthere, too...\d%K%P
\dOh...you perv...\d%K%P
Kaede had clearly noticed, too.%K%P
She looked right at my crotch, her face beet red.%K%P
\dI'm glad I could excite you, though.\d%K%P
The blush spread all over her body.%K%P
It made her cuter than ever before. At least,\nthat's what it felt like to me.%K%P
